about_the_game:
The fantasy and horror shooter, "Castle of Shikigami" is back for the third time!!

We are releasing an original soundtrack that includes all the sounds played in the game !

With its fast-paced gameplay and charming characters, "Castle of Shikigami" has captivated a wide range of fans, not just players, like never before. This is a must-have soundtrack for fans of "Castle of Shikigami III," the latest installment in the "Castle of Shikigami" series.
